titleStmt.title: VVit for mony being a full relation of the life, actions, merry conceits, and pretty pranks of Captain Iames Hind the famous robber both in England, Holland, and Ireland : with his new progresse through Berkshire, Oxfordshire, and adjacent counties begun on Monday the first of March, 1651, with the judges of the assize for that circuit.
titleStmt.author: Fidge, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Vere, and William Gilbertson, and are to sold at their shops ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Fidge by Wing.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
